# HMCharacteristicValueCurrentHumidifierDehumidifierState.inactive

**Case**

The accesory is off.

## Declaration

```swift
case inactive
```

## Current States

- **HMCharacteristicValueCurrentHumidifierDehumidifierState.idle**: The accessory is idle.
- **HMCharacteristicValueCurrentHumidifierDehumidifierState.humidifying**: The accessory is adding water to the air.
- **HMCharacteristicValueCurrentHumidifierDehumidifierState.dehumidifying**: The accessory is removing water from the air.

items.description: The accessory is adding water to the air.
items.name: HMCharacteristicValueCurrentHumidifierDehumidifierState.humidifying

items.description: The accessory is removing water from the air.
items.name: HMCharacteristicValueCurrentHumidifierDehumidifierState.dehumidifying
